title: FS: Young, Matty, Old Mill, EPDG, PSA 5s etc (lots of good stuff)
author: Luke

posts.post_title: FS: Young, Matty, Old Mill, EPDG, PSA 5s etc (lots of good stuff)
posts.post_content:
Need to sell about $600 worth of stuff.  After I do, I may close this sale, so please let me know if you want anything.

I need Paypal funds asap, so that is the only accepted payment method for these cards.

All prices include shipping within the U.S.

Young Old Mill portrait $1550
Matty dark cap SGC 40 $485 sold
Donovan EPDG PSA 5 $400
Seymour Sovereign 350 Green Apple $215
Happy Smith Old Mill PSA 5.5 $450
Willis Polar Bear SGC 60 $285 sold
